name: Miko Mole
description: Miko Mole on PC features charismatic Miko with a passion for shiny gems, who is on a mission to become master thief by collecting enough diamonds on each level to open its exit to progress.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.8 GHZ processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 Compatible Sound Device
